message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value, potentially exceeding $1500000.  While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product, I'm confident it has the potential to be extremely beneficial for the right individual. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.  This is a substantial investment, but I'm confident that the value I'm offering will justify the price. Let me know your thoughts.
